lines_and_colors: She's happy - with a new Content -
That feels to her - like Sacrament -
She's busy - with an altered Care -
As just apprenticed to the Air -
She's tearful - if she weep at all -
For blissful Causes - Most of all
That Heaven permit so meek as her -
To such a Fate - to minister -
document.title: She's happy with a new content
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
